verses.verse: The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> them the <S%H4492>dens<s%> which are in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and the <S%H4631>caves,<s%> and the <S%H4679>strongholds.<s%>

So it <S%H3478>was,<s%> when Israel had <S%H2232>sown,<s%> that the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east;<s%> they came up against <S%H5927>them;<s%>

and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H7843>them,<s%> and destroyed the <S%H2981>increase<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> until you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H7604>left<s%> no <S%H4241>sustenance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> neither <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> nor <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>

For they came <S%H5927>up<s%> with their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and their <S%H168>tents;<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H1767>as<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> both they and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were without <S%H4557>number:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> to destroy <S%H7843>it.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> was brought <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
It <S%H1121>happened,<s%> when the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H182>because<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%>

that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'I brought you up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all who <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> <S%H1644>you,<s%> and drove them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and gave you their <S%H776>land;<s%>

and I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> "I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in whose <S%H776>land<s%> you <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>" But you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>'"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> under the <S%H424>oak<s%> which was in <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> that pertained to <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H33>Abiezrite:<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H2251>beating<s%> out <S%H2406>wheat<s%> in the <S%H1660>winepress,<s%> to <S%H5127>hide<s%> it <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "Yahweh is with <S%H1368>you,<s%> you mighty man of <S%H2428>valor!<s%>"

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H994>him,<s%> "Oh, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H3426>if<s%> <S%H113>Yahweh<s%> is with <S%H4672>us,<s%> why then has all this happened to <S%H6381>us?<s%> Where are all his wondrous works which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> us <S%H559>of,<s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'Didn't Yahweh bring us <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>' But now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5203>cast<s%> us <S%H5414>off,<s%> and delivered us into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> at <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H3212>"Go<s%> in this your <S%H3581>might,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%> <S%H7971>Haven't<s%> I sent you?"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H994>him,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> shall I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H504>Behold,<s%> my family is the <S%H1800>poorest<s%> in <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and I am the <S%H6810>least<s%> in my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5221>him,<s%> "Surely I will be with you, and you shall strike the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4672>him,<s%> "If now I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H6213>show<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> that it is you who talk with <S%H1696>me.<s%>

Please <S%H4185>don't<s%> go away, until I <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3318>you,<s%> and bring out my <S%H4503>present,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>you.<s%>" He said, "I will <S%H3427>wait<s%> until you come <S%H7725>back.<s%>"

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H6213>prepared<s%> a young <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>meal.<s%> He <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> in a <S%H5536>basket<s%> and he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4839>broth<s%> in a <S%H6517>pot,<s%> and brought it <S%H3318>out<s%> to him under the <S%H424>oak,<s%> and presented <S%H5066>it.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3947>him,<s%> "Take the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them on <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> the <S%H4839>broth.<s%>" He did <S%H6213>so.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4938>staff<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes;<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> out of his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H3651>Because<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face!<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7965>him,<s%> "Peace be to <S%H3372>you!<s%> Don't be afraid. You shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> there to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%> "Yahweh is <S%H3117>Peace.<s%>" To this day it is still in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites.<s%>

It happened the same <S%H3915>night,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3947>him,<s%> "Take your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6499><s%> <S%H7794>bull,<s%> even the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> years <S%H8141>old,<s%> and throw <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> that your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2040>has,<s%> and cut down the Asherah that is by <S%H842>it;<s%>

and <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of this <S%H4581>stronghold,<s%> in an orderly <S%H4634>way,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5927>offering<s%> with the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> which you shall cut <S%H3772>down.<s%>"

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H3372>him:<s%> and it happened, because he feared his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> so that he could not <S%H6213>do<s%> it by <S%H3119>day,<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> it by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

When the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H4196>behold,<s%> the altar of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> was broken <S%H5422>down,<s%> and the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> was cut <S%H5422>down<s%> that was by <S%H8145>it,<s%> and the second <S%H6499>bull<s%> was <S%H5927>offered<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was <S%H1129>built.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> "Who has <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing?<s%>" When they <S%H1875>inquired<s%> and <S%H1245>asked,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1439>"Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> "Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> because he has broken <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and because he has cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the Asherah that was by <S%H842>it.<s%>"

<S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all who <S%H5975>stood<s%> against <S%H7378>him,<s%> "Will you contend for <S%H1168>Baal?<s%> Or will you <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7378>him?<s%> He who will contend for <S%H4191>him,<s%> let him be put to death by <S%H1242>morning.<s%> If he is a <S%H430>god,<s%> let him <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H5422>himself,<s%> because someone has broken down his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

Therefore on that <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>named<s%> him <S%H3378>Jerub-Baal,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H7378>contend<s%> against <S%H5422>him,<s%> because he has broken down his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

Then all the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H622>assembled<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together;<s%> and they passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

But the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> on <S%H1439>Gideon;<s%> and he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet;<s%> and <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> was <S%H2199>gathered<s%> together after <S%H310>him.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout all <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and they also were <S%H2199>gathered<s%> together <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7971>him:<s%> and he sent <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and to <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and to <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> and they came <S%H5927>up<s%> to meet <S%H7125>them.<s%>
<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "If you <S%H3426>will<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>

<S%H3322>behold,<s%> I will put a <S%H1492>fleece<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> on the threshing <S%H1637>floor;<s%> if there is <S%H2919>dew<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H2721>only,<s%> and it is dry on all the <S%H776>ground,<s%> then shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"

It was <S%H7925>so;<s%> for he rose up early on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> and <S%H2115>pressed<s%> the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H2115>together,<s%> and <S%H4680>wrung<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> out of the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> a <S%H5602>bowl<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H639>"Don't<s%> let your anger be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1696>me,<s%> and I will speak but this <S%H6471>once.<s%> Please let me make a <S%H5254>trial<s%> just this <S%H6471>once<s%> with the <S%H1492>fleece.<s%> Let it now be <S%H2721>dry<s%> only on the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> and on all the <S%H776>ground<s%> let there be <S%H2919>dew.<s%>"
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so that <S%H3915>night:<s%> for it was <S%H2721>dry<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H2919>only,<s%> and there was dew on all the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
